text: Alan Walton (April 3, 1936 - July 4, 2015) was a British biochemist. He was Chairman of Oxford Bioscience Corporation. He served on numerous Boards of Directors. Walton was an important figure in the development and funding of the Human Genome Project. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2015 deaths Category:British chemists Category:People from Birmingham
title: Alan Walton
